Controller - Class in <Unnamed>
Provides the functionality to the Wileven Machine's components by sending and receiving information between the view and the interpreter, loader, and model.

Controller.EndOrRestart - Class in <Unnamed>
An action listener that takes the user input in the text field of the View and either changes the action listener to GetFileLocation, restarts the Wileven Machine, or exits.

Controller.RunOrSetOptions - Class in <Unnamed>

Controller.RunOrSetOptions() - Constructor for class Controller.RunOrSetOptions
 
Controller.SetOptions - Class in <Unnamed>
An action listener that takes the user input in the text field of the View, sets that as the new instruction limit, then goes back to the run or options action listener.
Controller.SetOptions() - Constructor for class Controller.SetOptions
 
Controller.StepMode - Class in <Unnamed>

convertFromTwosComplement(Integer) - Static method in class Utility
